components.name: Frontend
components.description: A Single Page Application (SPA) developed using React with TypeScript, utilizing Redux for state management and Material-UI for UI components.

components.name: User Service
components.description: Manages user authentication and user-related data, ensuring secure access to the platform.

components.name: Order Service
components.description: Responsible for processing and fulfilling customer orders, interacting with the Payment Service for transactions.

components.name: Payment Service
components.description: Integrates with external payment processors like Stripe to handle transactions securely.

components.name: User Database
components.description: Utilizes PostgreSQL to store user information securely, ensuring data integrity and availability.

data_flows.description: User credentials are sent from the frontend to the User Service for authentication.
Order details are sent from the Order Service to the Payment Service to process payments.
User data is stored and retrieved from the User Database by the User Service.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that protects user data and authentication processes.

trust_boundaries.name: Payment Processing Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that secures payment transactions and sensitive financial data.
